= GPG Keys =

The file located on

{{{ https://mybatis.googlecode.com/svn/KEYS }}}

contains the !MyBatis developers GPG keys. Users can import the keys to verify the artifact signatures.

= Users =

Checkout the file by running

{{{ svn co --depth=files https://mybatis.googlecode.com/svn }}}

and run

{{{ gpg --import KEYS }}}

= Developers =

Checkout the file by running

{{{ svn co --depth=files https://mybatis.googlecode.com/svn }}}

and run

{{{ (gpg --list-sigs <your name> && gpg --armor --export <your name>) >> KEYS }}}

then recommit

{{{ svn ci -m "added simone's gpg key" }}}
